channel.title: Comments on: Why IPython is the best thing since sliced bread

item.title: By: Shantnu
item.dc:creator: Shantnu
item.description: You are right. It did provide a link to iPython, but they must have changed it. I'll remove the link. Thanks,
item.content:encoded: You are right. It did provide a link to iPython, but they must have changed it. I’ll remove the link. Thanks,

item.title: By: AstroFloyd
item.dc:creator: AstroFloyd
item.description: Thanks, very useful info. Note that the online shell you link to provides a (bare) Python shell, not iPython.
item.content:encoded: Thanks, very useful info. Note that the online shell you link to provides a (bare) Python shell, not iPython.

item.title: By: Jim
item.dc:creator: Jim
item.description: Thanks. This is excellent information. I used IDLE for a while and liked it until I began using IPython. No comparison. Your article has opened up even more capabilities. Thanks! Jim
item.content:encoded: Thanks. This is excellent information. I used IDLE for a while and liked it until I began using IPython. No comparison. Your article has opened up even more capabilities. Thanks! Jim

item.title: By: Michael
item.dc:creator: Michael
item.description: For Mac users there is also a standalone frontend to IPython, called "Pineapple". https://nwhitehead.github.io/pineapple/
item.content:encoded:
For Mac users there is also a standalone frontend to IPython, called “Pineapple”.
https://nwhitehead.github.io/pineapple/

item.title: By: Shantnu
item.dc:creator: Shantnu
item.description: That's a great link! Thanks for sharing. It'll go in the blog.
item.content:encoded: That’s a great link! Thanks for sharing. It’ll go in the blog.

item.title: By: Shantnu
item.dc:creator: Shantnu
item.description: True about the bloated monstrosities. I'm looking at you, Eclipse.
item.content:encoded: True about the bloated monstrosities. I’m looking at you, Eclipse.
